content: paw with 2nd color row instruction stitches 1 chain 2 6 single_crochet in second chain from hook join chain 1 6 2 *2 single_crochet in each single_crochet* around 12 3 *single_crochet in next 1 single_crochet increase in next single_crochet* around if using two colors change 18 back to main color at end of this row 4 work even single_crochet in each single_crochet around 18 5 work even 18 6 *single_crochet in next 1 single_crochet decrease over next 2 single_crochet* around 12 7 *single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet decrease over next 2 single_crochet* around 9 8 work even stuff foot / paw at this point stuff firmly 9 9 - work even work even slip_stitch to join and bind off leaving an 8 9 17 long tail to sew the leg to the body later on do not stuff the rest of the leg page 4 of 10 copyright by sherri bush http //www ravelry com/designers/sherri-bush sherricrochets@gmail com ears make 2 row instruction stitches 1 chain 2 4 single_crochet in second chain from hook join chain 1 4 2 work 2 single_crochet in each single_crochet around including the joining chain from the 10 previous round join chain 1 3 work 2 single_crochet in same stitch as joining single_crochet in next 4 single_crochet work 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet 12 single_crochet in next 4 single_crochet 4 *decrease over next 2 stitches* around slip_stitch to join and bind off 6 leaving an 8 long tail so you can sew the ears to the head later on do not stuff the ears they will lay flat tail row instruction stitches stuff tail as you go along 1 chain 2 5 single_crochet in second chain from hook join chain 1 5 2 *2 single_crochet in same single_crochet single_crochet in next single_crochet* around 8 3 - work even by single_crochet in each single_crochet around slip_stitch to join in last round 8 15 bind off and leave an 8 inch tail so you can sew the tail to the body later on i ve made my tails from 13 15 row long i think 15 may be too long 8 though and i like 13 better … you pick monkey s face the monkey s face is the only piece not worked entirely in the round you are going to chain 1 and turn in the 4th row so in the 5th row you are working on the back or wrong side of this piece you will also use your alternate color for this piece row instruction stitches 1 chain 2 6 single_crochet in second chain from hook join chain 1 6 2 *2 single_crochet in every single_crochet* around 12 3 *single_crochet in next 1 single_crochet increase in next single_crochet* around 18 4 single_crochet same single_crochet as joining and in next 5 single_crochet increase single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet increase single_crochet in 18 next 6 single_crochet chain 1 turn **you should be 2 stitches before where you would join** 5 on the wrong side 24 single_crochet in
